complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add SEO Component to ForConsumers.tsx and ForBusinesses.tsx
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - simple component addition.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Straightforward copy-paste implementation using existing SEO component on 2 files. Minimal risk, clear specs, standard React Helmet pattern. Testing via browser inspection is basic.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add SEO Component to BuildCredit.tsx and BusinessCreditBuilder.tsx
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - identical to task 11 pattern.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Identical to task 11: add SEO component to 2 files with provided metadata. Depends on 11 completing successfully. Standard implementation with basic verification.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement SEO for Resources, ArticlesInsights, and FinancialCalculators.tsx
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - consistent SEO component pattern across 3 files.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: 3 files instead of 2, but same pattern. Requires ensuring canonical URLs match routes exactly. Build-time testing adds slight complexity but remains low effort.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Complete SEO Rollout for Credit Services Pages (Monitoring to DebtRelief)
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break into two subtasks: 1) Implement SEO for first 4 credit service pages (CreditMonitoring to [midpoint]), 2) Implement remaining 3 pages with final validation script.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Batch of 7 pages requires creating unique descriptions for each. Higher volume increases copy-paste error risk. Puppeteer test script adds testing complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: SEO Implementation for Loan and Funding Pages
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: 1) Personal loan/credit card pages (4 pages), 2) Business funding pages (4 pages), 3) Lighthouse SEO audit and validation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: 8 pages with keyword-specific descriptions. Lighthouse audit targeting 90+ score requires performance knowledge beyond basic meta tags.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: SEO for News, Contact, Legal, and 404 Pages
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - 4 standard pages with clear specifications.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: 4 pages including special 404 handling. Straightforward but 404 meta requires understanding helpful error page SEO best practices.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Update generate-sitemap.js to Include All Routes
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: 1) Extract all routes from App.tsx into sitemap generator, 2) Test sitemap generation and validate XML structure across all 30+ routes.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires parsing React Router config from App.tsx, dynamic route generation. 30+ routes increases testing surface. XML validation adds tooling complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Update public/robots.txt and Submit React Sitemap to GSC
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - simple config file + GSC submission.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Standard robots.txt update and GSC submission. Requires understanding GSC property management but follows clear template.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Configure WordPress Rank Math Sitemap and robots.txt
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: 1) Configure Rank Math sitemap settings, 2) Update WordPress robots.txt and validate all sitemap endpoints.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: WordPress-specific admin panel navigation. Rank Math plugin settings + multiple sitemap validation (post-sitemap.xml, page-sitemap.xml).

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: WordPress Blog GSC Property Setup and Sitemap Submission
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: No expansion needed - standard GSC property verification and submission.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: GSC property verification (DNS/HTML methods) + sitemap submission. Requires domain access and 24-48hr verification wait time.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Resolve React GSC Coverage Issues and Request Indexing
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: 1) Analyze GSC Coverage report and categorize issues (404s, duplicates, noindex), 2) Fix canonical/redirect issues from prior SEO tasks, 3) Bulk request indexing for key pages and monitor results.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Diagnostic task requiring GSC expertise. Issue categorization, prioritization, and fixes span multiple prior tasks. 48hr monitoring period.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: 1) Audit canonical URLs across both domains using Screaming Frog, 2) Implement cross-domain links (React→WP and WP→React) with nofollow considerations.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires SEO audit tool (Screaming Frog), cross-domain coordination, canonical chain verification. Link implementation across two CMS systems.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Technical SEO Audits and LocalBusiness Schema Addition
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: 1) Lighthouse audits and heading/image fixes, 2) Implement LocalBusiness JSON-LD schema, 3) Validate schema with Google's Rich Results Test and Core Web Vitals.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Multiple tools (Lighthouse, Rich Results Test), schema markup implementation, Core Web Vitals optimization. High coordination across performance/SEO.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Optimize index.html Meta Tags and Analytics Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: 1) Update index.html OG images/favicons/preconnect, 2) Verify GA4 implementation and GSC-Analytics linking.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Static HTML updates + analytics verification across two sites. GA4 DebugView testing requires real-time traffic simulation.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: WordPress Technical Audit and Content Optimization
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: 1) Bulk optimize existing posts (focus keywords, metas, internal links), 2) Configure image optimization (W3 Total Cache) and validate Rank Math scores.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Content editing across multiple posts, Rank Math bulk operations, caching configuration. Requires content/SEO expertise beyond code changes.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Establish SEO Monitoring and Baseline Documentation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Split into: 1) Configure GSC alerts and record baseline metrics, 2) Create monitoring Google Sheet with weekly checklist template.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Process documentation + GSC configuration. Creates ongoing monitoring infrastructure but straightforward admin tasks.
